thread.title: Lululemon Still Has Room to Run
thread.title_full: Lululemon Still Has Room to Run - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Lululemon Still Has Room to Run
text:
Who’s laughing now?
Just over a year ago, private-equity firm Advent International made a big bet on Lululemon Athletica Inc., a company that spawned a thousand punchlines. After the dazzlingly successful and profitable yoga apparel retailer was forced to recall see-through pants, its founder and then-largest shareholder Dennis “Chip” Wilson repeatedly showed off an amazing yoga trick—the ability to put his foot in his mouth.
... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
